negotiator.boaframework.opponentmodel

Class WorstModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • genius.core.boaframework.BOA
      • genius.core.boaframework.OpponentModel
        • negotiator.boaframework.opponentmodel.WorstModel

  • public class WorstModel
extends OpponentModel
    The theoretically worst opponent model. Note that for using this model experimentalSetup should be enabled in global. Tim Baarslag, Koen Hindriks, Mark Hendrikx, Alex Dirkzwager and Catholijn M. Jonker. Decoupling Negotiating Agents to Explore the Space of Negotiation Strategies
    Author:
    Mark Hendrikx
